title: Hello There
overview: Adapted from the web novel "Zui Dao Xu Deng Jun Lai Fu" (醉倒需等君来扶) by Ni Shi Yi (倪十一 ).This drama tells the story of the quirky and cute Tang Buyan, who is looking for a the person she's fated to be who apparently has a mole at the corner of his eye to help unravel the problem of her family's bloodline. By a coincidence, she meets the cool and elegant young master of the Xuanqi Sect, Li Chengqi, and their fates intertwine..
